resources.string:
This is PoC for tampering with 
/data/system/install_sessions.xml 
through integer overflow in 
BinaryXmlSerializer.attributeBytesBase64(), 
followed by modification of 
/data/system/packages.xml 
in order to allow installation of apk with 
android:sharedUserId="android.uid.system" 
despite mismatching signature


Press "Do everything" to do all steps automatically, this will involve two system restarts


Alternatively, do following manually: 
1. In this app press "Stage 1" 
2. Once that is done, press "Reboot" to restart system_server (in order to reload its state) 
3. Open this app (AbxOverflow) again this app press "Stage 2" 
4. Press "Reboot" again 
5. Open newly installed "AbxDroppedApk" application
